attributes.action: Keep the Britains strongest man competition 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Channel 5 have decided that they don't want to put on Britain's Strongest Man any longer so 2008 may be the last one ever.

For those of us who enjoy watching it, it will be a huge disappointment to not see it on the TV this year.

This is a great National event which brings together the strongest and greatest athletes from all over the UK 

Please help us to keep the Britains Strongest man competetion and sign the petition to keep it running

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
